job.title: Google Cloud Platform (GCP) Engineer
job.description:
US Tech Solutions is seeking an “Google Cloud Platform (GCP) Engineer” for a 6 months contract to hire position with a client in Dallas, TX


Job Poster: Sheraz Durrani – Sheraz@ustechsolutionsinc.com


Title: Google Cloud Platform (GCP) Engineer

Work Location: Dallas, TX, 100% Remote

Duration: 6 Months Contract to Hire

COVID PROTOCOL: Must be fully vaccinated.


Description:

· We’re looking for an innovative Google Cloud Platform (GCP) Engineer who is passionate and enthusiastic about leveraging GCP in all aspects.

· Your experience is needed to help us scale out our use of GCP for a client that truly understands and supports the value of Google technologies.

· You will own the environment, and with your vision, help architect, build and deploy for enterprise scale various applications in support of our work with the client.


Job Responsibilities

· 2-4 years of GCP experience as a data engineer and cloud architect, including:

· Understanding how to configure access and security as needed (Cloud Identity & Access Management)

· Development of machine templates and blueprints with GCP

· Leveraging multiple GCP services related to data management, storage, workflows and scalability (e.g., BigQuery, PubSub, Dataflow, Cloud Storage, etc.)

· Proficiency in SQL Skills (i.e., DML and DDL).

· Strong understanding of relational database management systems (RDBMS) concepts, including primary/foreign keys, indexing, data types, referential integrity, ERD, etc.

· Familiarity with multiple GCP APIs (Cloud Storage, Vision, Logging, Monitoring, Stackdriver, Google App Engine, DLP, NLP, Cloud Tasks).

· Experience with IOT data

· Minimum 2 certifications in GCP

· Working knowledge or experience with Java, HTML and/or JQuery is a plus

· Experience with web mapping tools and spatial databases is a plus.


Work experience

· 2 to 4 years of experience.


Education

· Bachelor's degree (BA/BS) in a related field such as information systems, mathematics


About US Tech Solutions:

Your talent, our opportunities - This is the premise behind US Tech Solutions.

You have the skill we have the opportunity. As a team, we work passionately for you to get the right career opportunity across industry verticals and functions. For past sixteen years, leading Global

Companies and Fortune 500 come to us to get the right talent. Whether you want to work as full-time, contractor or part-time, technical or non-technical our talent consultants will connect with the right career opportunity globally.

Connect with our talent team today.

USTECH was founded in 2000 by Manoj Agarwal. Today, we are a global firm offering talent solutions to 150 customers including 20% of Fortune 500 across Financial Services, Healthcare, Life Sciences, Aerospace, Energy, Retail, Telecom, Technology, Manufacturing, and Engineering. We are headquartered in New Jersey with 40 global locations across the USA, Canada, Europe, and India. Deloitte has recognized USTECH as one of the fastest growing private businesses for the past five consecutive years and INC 500 for the past three. We have also been rated “The Top Business in the US" by Diversity Business since 2011. To learn more about how US Tech Solutions visit our website: www.ustechsolutions.com.

“U.S. Tech Solutions, Inc. is an Affirmative Action, Equal Opportunity Employer. Our employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, religion, gender, national origin, age, disability, marital status, veteran or military status, or any other legally protected status.”
